item.description:
SORRY GUYS.... This one is for the girls. Come join me for a night of fun including Make-Up and Martinis. Friday June 23 from 7-9 pm a professional make-up artist will be available to take the guess work out of color selections and show you the correct ways to apply make-up with a new botanically based make-up line. Products available for purchase the night of the party. Don't miss your chance to find your new face. For each friend you bring you are entered to win a free product.

Must R.S.V.P. by Monday June 19th.

For more information feel free to contact me at
kristie.goodgion@genzyme.com
item.name: Make-Up and Martini Party
